name: Get More Leads
author: Webcomum

sections.description: This module lets you connect your Get More Leads account with your WordPress site letting you insert there all your call-to-actions created, adding snippet code provided by our application in all wordpress pages or posts, without having to get your hands directly in the code. All you have to do is paste the snippet code you want to add to your site and we will do the hard job to make it work in the right manner.
sections.installation:
1. Upload getmoreleads directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure module
  4. Paste the snippet code provided by Get More Leads application in blank space (you dont need to add scripts tags)
sections.faq:
Do I need to know how to code or design?

Not at all! Get More Leads was created specifically in order to make your tasks easier so no coding or design knowledge is required.

Can I use Get More Leads module for free?

Absolutely!

short_description: This module allows you to add the snippet code provided by Get More Leads application to the footer of your blog by hooking into wp_footer.
description: This module lets you connect your Get More Leads account with your WordPress site letting you insert there all your call-to-actions created, adding snippet code provided by our application in all wordpress pages or posts, without having to get your hands directly in the code. All you have to do is paste the snippet code you want to add to your site and we will do the hard job to make it work in the right manner.
